title: [Lumnea Meadow]
description: A thick stand of thistle has grown up beside the path, its deep purple flowers nodding in the summer breeze.  Butterflies and bumblebees compete for space amongst the flowers, alighting momentarily and then flitting about once more.
A thick stand of thistle has grown up beside the path, its deep purple flowers nodding in the evening breeze.  Silvery moonlight washes the plants in an ethereal glow.
